title: Engineering Head
tagsAndSkills: Drafting,Sheet Metal Design,Bom Management,Fabrication Drawing,Design,Management,Metal,Sheet
jobDescription:
Job Description: Engineering Head reporting to the plant head

Location: Navi Mumbai

Company Overview: We are a leading manufacturer of transformer tanks, specializing in sheet metal fabrication. With a legacy of excellence and a commitment to quality, we cater to a diverse clientele by delivering top-notch products based on customer drawings and specifications.

Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Engineering Manager to lead our drafting engineering team and ensure the accuracy and efficiency of our manufacturing processes. The successful candidate will play a pivotal role in overseeing the drafting of transformer tanks, ensuring the correctness of the Bill of Materials (BOM), and optimizing the manufacturing processes to enhance plant throughput.

Key Responsibilities:

  1. Team Leadership:
    • Lead and manage a team of 3 drafting engineers.
    • Ensure high-quality drafting work that meets customer specifications.
    • Provide guidance, mentorship, and performance feedback to team members.
    • Team player and ability to integrate the team.
  2. Drafting and BOM Accuracy:
    • Oversee the drafting process to ensure accuracy and compliance with customer drawings.
    • Review and validate the Bill of Materials (BOM) prepared by the drafting team.
    • Ensure all engineering documentation is precise and up-to-date.
  3. Process Optimization:
    • Collaborate with plant operations to select the most efficient manufacturing processes for transformer tanks.
    • Identify and implement process improvements to increase plant throughput and efficiency.
    • Stay updated with the latest advancements in sheet metal fabrication and integrate best practices into the workflow.
    • Knowledge of operation CNC machines VMC/HMC , including CNC bending and CNC laser cutting and CNC plasma cutting.
    • Drafting of the components for the drawings received from the customers.
    • Identify the Manufacturing process for each component and select the right material thickness and the specifications.
    • Value mapping and ensuring how the component will be made most efficiently in terms of speed, machine yield and the easy of welding.
    • jigs, tools, tackles, etc.) in coordination with users for technological upgrades and superiority.
  4. Cross-Functional Collaboration:
    • Work closely with the production, quality, and procurement teams to ensure seamless operations.
    • Address and resolve any engineering-related issues that may arise during the manufacturing process.
  5. Quality Assurance:
    • Ensure all products meet the company's quality standards and customer expectations.
    • Implement and maintain quality control processes within the engineering department.
  6. Ensuring correctness of the drafting, checking that the dimensions are correct and all the tank components will batch and fit and the overall dimensions accuracy.
  7. Knowledge of sheet metal fabrication and process to avoid distortion.
    • Develop and install production and manufacturing technology (processes, fixtures,
  8. Prepare revision drawings promptly after modifications and issue prints to all concerned users, including external vendors.ensure proper change mangmenet process is implemented.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or a related field.
  • Minimum of 5 years of experience in sheet metal fabrication, with at least 2 years in a managerial role.
  • Strong understanding of drafting principles and BOM management.
  • Proficient in CAD software and other drafting tools. Knowledge of solid works and AutoCAD is a must.
  • Knowledge of welding processes for thin sheet metal.
  • Preparation of welding joints to avoid leakage.
  • Knowledge of bending.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Strong leadership and team management abilities.
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
  • Knowledge of transformer tank manufacturing processes is a plus.

Compensation: Competitive salary based on experience, along with benefits package.


Join us in shaping the future of transformer tank manufacturing with innovation and excellence.

title: Assistant iOS Developer
tagsAndSkills: Swift,IOS,Push notifications,Firebase,Rest,Unit Testing,MVP,MVC MVVM

ambitionBoxData.Title: Loyalie IT Solutions Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Assistant IOS Developer


We are looking for a tech enthusiast who is excited about working in a tech startup to bring the product vision to life, and passionate about learning new technologies and building scalable and highly secure web applications with outstanding user-experience. We are a small team and you will be working directly under the VP of Engineering on designing our frontend mobile applications on iOS using Swift. We have a strong culture of supporting the development of our employees, and you will have great opportunities to learn and grow along with the team.

A. Job Description:

  • To develop applications for devices powered by the IOS operating system
  • Build a strong understanding of the product and deliver product features which are user-friendly
  • Design, architect and build our IOS mobile applications with clean code.
  • Implement pixel perfect UI's with clean animations and transitions that match designs share by the UI/UX team.
  • Integrate backend APIs, including third-party API's, where required.
  • Write unit and integration tests
  • Understand IOS best practices and a commitment to following them
  • Follow agile sprint planning and development process
  • Bug fixing and improving application performance
  • Responsible for product development
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.

Skills Required

  • Result Orientation
  • SWIFT Skills
  • IOS Interactivity
  • IOS Test


H. Location: Bangalore

Requirements

  1. Must have good working experience with Swift v5 and familiar with XCODE v13.
  2. Must have knowledge about MVC, MVVM, MVP design patterns.
  3. Must be familiar with Alamofire, Object Mapper Parser
  4. Has knowledge about Unit Testing
  5. Must have experience with 3rd party libraries
  6. Experience with remote data via REST and JSON
  7. Experience with Firebase, Push notifications, MixPanel

Interested Candidates can mail their updated CV to hr@reloy.co or contact 9088331010
